title: LANE STEALING
body: RIOT should do something with that players

replies.body: Report them with a comment saying what they did, Because if it's ranked/draft, they can be banned.
even in blind/draft people do it and there is no punishment for it

Blind doesn't get this feature, as there isn't preset picks, but they are supposed to do it for draft games, as your roles are pre-determined on Riot's side.

That said, a lot of the drafts that WOULD have someone doing stuff like that, end up getting dodged.
